languages.text: Эмелина Лихтенхарт находится внутри археологической шахты — именно туда выжившие направили Вольного Торговца.
Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.
languages.original_text: Эмелина Лихтенхарт находится внутри археологической шахты — именно туда выжившие направили Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

languages.text: Emelina Lichtenhart se trouve quelque part dans la mine archéologique. C'est là que les survivants ont dit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de se rendre.
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

traits.locale_text: Emelina Lichtenhart se trouve quelque part dans la mine archéologique. C'est là que les survivants ont dit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de se rendre.

languages.text: 艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特在考古遗址的某个地方，幸存者让行商浪人前往该处。
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

traits.locale_text: 艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特在考古遗址的某个地方，幸存者让行商浪人前往该处。

languages.text: エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは鉱山の遺跡のどこかにいる。そこは生存者が自由開拓者に赴くよう伝えた場所だ。
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

traits.locale_text: エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは鉱山の遺跡のどこかにいる。そこは生存者が自由開拓者に赴くよう伝えた場所だ。

languages.text: Emelina Lichtenhart ist irgendwo in der archäologischen Mine. Dorthin haben die Überlebenden {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} geschickt.
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

traits.locale_text: Emelina Lichtenhart ist irgendwo in der archäologischen Mine. Dorthin haben die Überlebenden {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} geschickt.

languages.text: Emelina Lichtenhart está en algún lugar de la excavación arqueológica. Los supervivientes han dirigido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente allí.
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.

traits.locale_text: Emelina Lichtenhart está en algún lugar de la excavación arqueológica. Los supervivientes han dirigido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente allí.

languages.text: Emelina Lichtenhart, arkeolojik madende bir yerde olmalı. Hayatta kalanlar da Hür Tacir'e oraya gitmesini söylemişti.
languages.original_text: Emelina Lichtenhart is somewhere in the archaeological mine — that is where the survivors have told the Rogue Trader to go.
